member.name: T:InDoOut_Testing.TriggerableTestingExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for testing classes.

member.name: M:InDoOut_Testing.TriggerableTestingExtensions.WaitForCompletion(InDoOut_Core.Entities.Core.ITriggerable,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Waits indefinitely (1 day) for to complete, then continues. This can be used to ensure the running of a particular triggerable is complete before testing outputs.
member.param: Whether to wait for the function to start first.

member.name: M:InDoOut_Testing.TriggerableTestingExtensions.WaitForCompletion(InDoOut_Core.Entities.Core.ITriggerable,System.TimeSpan,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Waits for to complete within the specified time given by and returns whether it completed in time or not.
member.param: The amount of time to wait for the triggerable to complete.
Whether to wait for the triggerable to start first.
member.returns: Whether the triggerable completed in time or not.

member.name: M:InDoOut_Testing.TriggerableTestingExtensions.SetPropertyValue(InDoOut_Core.Entities.Functions.IFunction,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of a property on the with the to .
member.param: The function to set the property on.
The name of the property to set.
The value to set the property to.
member.returns: Whether the value was successfully set.
